snippet.title: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2 - Karaoke Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now!
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/279940/
GoG.com: http://www.gog.com/game/the_book_of_u...

--------

Lyrics:
DRM Free, no micro-purchasing
No always online, no pay to win
before the days of Free To Play
we chose the way that we keep travelling.
When shadows fall, upon our land
When trolls are trolling, we make a stand
Join our adventure – [Nate only: boost our sales!]
The Book of Unwritten Tales....... 2

Sheet ot music and lyrics: http://ow.ly/Jjowp

Web: http://www.kingart-games.de/bout2/
Platforms: PC, Mac and Linux
